Wow my first time to clarks (a UK brand) here, after recommended by my friend as she mentioned she bought alot from this shop. I personally have a close to flat feet so most of my office footwear got wore out really fast (probably due to the way I walk and handle the shoe too). Been through many brands.. such as hush puppy, bata (worst), aldo and many other brands which i just can't recall off hand. Reason I dont stick to a specific brand was really I couldn't find one that last long enough..

Here I am trying at clarks and I have to say I am really impressed with this young lad (staff name is hairul azhar). Not saying he is super knowledgeable but he has the right attitude, customer service and patience to go through with me the shoe related questions, tips on maintenance and cheapest package I can get (for example atome payment method).

I am a shoe noob plus lazy but honestly after his advice, I am gonna properly take care of my new clarks leather shoe by regularly maintaining them at least once fortnightly. Plus the atome further deducts final price ny $10 and allows 3x instalment. Perfectly interesting and most importantly no credit card required. Just debit card and singpass to connect cause of instalment I think.
